name: Glitch Out (Beta)
description:
You are a hacker with an objective to glitch out a building. You have hacked into the building and now it is at your mercy! Have fun :)

P.S
Type HELP TRUE to see the help screen or HELP FALSE to close it!

Thanks to  Justanothercoder  for coding!  robotmeadows for making god music! And Thanks to Kiko Tomaz for coding! For a game jam called Billy's Basement Game Jam
